dcterms:description: The Human Connectome Project (HCP) provides a comprehensive dataset of brain connectivity derived from functional magnetic resonance imaging (fMRI) scans, allowing for the analysis of brain connectivity patterns across multiple subjects.
dcterms:title: Human Connectome Project (HCP)
